name: Inco's Spreading Emerald
effect: Gain 1 Æ. OR The next time you gain a card that costs 3 Æ or less this turn, any ally gains a copy of that card from the supply.

name: Lost's Forged Crystal
effect:
(When the game starts, add a Crystal to your discard pile.)
Gain 2 Æ.

name: Onyx Elixir
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a supply pile that costs 7 Æ or more. When a player gains a card from that supply pile, that player gains 2 life.

name: Ashen Rib
effect: Once per turn after a player plays their second relic, any ally draws a card.

name: Massacre Helm
effect: When you cast three or more spells during your casting phase, deal 3 damage.

name: Cloak Of Wisdom
effect: At the start of tyour main phase, if there are five or more cards in your discard pile, focus one of your closed breaches.
